content.question: Which of the following best explains why an incorrect value is printed?

choices.label: The private instance variables hourlyRate and hoursWorked should be declared public.
The private method calculateEarnings should be declared public.
The variable earnings in the calculateEarnings method is a local variable.
The variables hourlyRate and hoursWorked in the calculateEarnings method are local variables.

content.answer: The variable earnings in the calculateEarnings method is a local variable.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
